title: Strengthening e-Learning Practical Competencies: Understanding Functions Through Visual Representation: Mid-Term Intensive Course

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can manipulate function graphs using dynamic tools to visually explain relationships between variables.
Learners can convert real-world problems into function models and transform them into three representations: graphs, tables, and equations.
Learners can analyze the slope, intercept, and maximum/minimum values of functions with 80% accuracy in formative assessments using visual materials.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
